channel.title: My little edit of demisepking
channel.description:
Ok guys here the thing. I dont care if you flame me and say things to me because here i have put the correct credits.
[u]Demise Pking Features[/u]
All features from DemisePking
[u]My Features i added (Not much but i practiced on it :P)[/u]
New home!
Got rid of the stat clicking leveling system as i knew people could glitch.
Fixed most of the quest tab since not everything was coded rightly on that. If you still dont get where im getting at, I'm saying that if you click on arrowsit would give you food instead.
Added training to replace the click on the stat then type 99 training :) NPCS drop 20k 60% of the time.
Added shop on training zone with noob items only.
Have added portals at home for training and multi pk only.
Also just added a pure command in the quest tab. Puts everything up to 99 if they don't want to train apart from defense. Defense they have to train :P
You know what they say.. a picture says 1000 words :)
My new Home
[img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/4681/homertk.png[/img]
Training Zone
[img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/6549/trainingzone.png[/img]
Fixed Quest Tab
[img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/1604/questtab.png[/img]
I know not many pictures but everything else is demises :P
I just used this because i though I would give it a go in coding and thats what i did :)
CREDITS:
99.9% Demise 0.1% Me
Happy :)
Now for Download Link
Server Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?p0hofinxofkh66j
Client Download: Use demisepking client
